modName: FPKE - First Person and Killmoves Essential
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9433][img]http://i.imgur.com/BaYBz.png[/img][/url][/center]

[center][u][b]THE MOD WILL BE AVAILABLE TODAY, THE 14TH, STAY TUNED FOR UPDATES[/u] - [color=red]THE MOD WILL BE IN ALPHA STATE, MEANING THERE WILL PROBABLY BUGS[/color] - [u]READ BELOW FOR BASIC DETAILS[/u][/b][/center]

------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=red]New Killmoves :[/color] FPKE will add several new killmoves to the game ( 2 or 3 in the alpha version, more to come on next ones ) they won\'t replace any existent killmove and will have they own trigger conditions ( like sneaking, being detected, or using a certain type of weapon ). They will use existent Skyrim killmove animation, because creating new animations for killmoves is impossible, at least for a while, due to skeletons. [color=red]Video coming soon.[/color]

[color=red]Force the killmoves to play in first person :[/color] Every kilmove in the game ( except the dragon ones and other creatures for the moment, because of script issues ) will now play in first person, no matter what. Yes, even the standard 2H killmoves that don\'t have any first person counterpart. [color=red]Video coming soon.[/color]

[color=red]A more complete first person experience :[/color] Small things like the animation of your character sitting on a chair ( it\'s all i managed to fix at the moment ) will play in first person . [color=red]Video coming soon.[/color]

[color=red]Fully created and fully compatible with real 1st person mod :[/color] FPKE was created, and tested with a real 1st person base. You can\'t have a decent first person experience without it. More informations coming soon.

------------------------------------------------------------------
author: RFPV Team
